sentences.english: Pictures are transfered instantly to the Reuters editing system.
sentences.chinese: 拍攝後，照片會被立即傳送到路透社的編輯系統中。

sentences.english: The wildest rumours were circulating in Berlin last night, adds Reuter.
sentences.chinese: 路透社還稱，昨晚在柏林有幾個謠言在廣泛流傳。

sentences.english: Tens of thousands were stranded in other areas, the national fire service said, according to Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 據路透社報道，國家消防局說，好幾萬人身處險境。

sentences.english: Last year CNN said it was dropping Reuters’ wire service.
sentences.chinese: 去年，CNN宣稱退訂路透社的資訊服務。

sentences.english: Period," Morgenstein said in an email response to questions from Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 摩根史騰在給路透社的電郵回覆中說。

sentences.english: Reuters could not confirm whether the fire was started by the protesters. (Reuters/Carlos Vera)
sentences.chinese: 路透社不能證實此次大火是否爲抗議者所爲。

sentences.english: A Saudi government spokesman contacted by Reuters declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 路透社就此聯繫了沙特政府發言人，但他拒絕評論。

sentences.english: Reuter never waste a moment in providing the news.
sentences.chinese: 路透社提供新聞時不浪費一點時間。

sentences.english: Pity the general public reads Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 向路透社的廣大讀者表示同情。

sentences.english: This is what I found out from a report that Reuters recently published.
sentences.chinese: 這是我在路透社最近發表的一篇報道中發覺的。

sentences.english: Reuters news agency reported large numbers of arrests.
sentences.chinese: 路透社通訊社報道大量的逮捕行動。

sentences.english: "Russia is going into decline, "Kasyanov, 57, told Reuters in an interview on Wednesday evening.
sentences.chinese: “俄羅斯正在衰退，”57歲的他對路透社說。

sentences.english: Reuters, the economics version of the World Cup's Paul the octopus?
sentences.chinese: 路透社，難道是經濟版的“世界盃章魚哥”？

sentences.english: The entire Reuters family will mourn this tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 整個路透社大家庭都將哀悼這一悲劇。

sentences.english: That's Reuters. That's quite a famous building
sentences.chinese: 那是路透社。那是一棟相當有名的大樓，

definition: to quote/to cite/to recommend (one's friend's, associates etc)

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

definition: Associated Press (AP)/abbr. for 美國聯合通訊社|美国联合通讯社[Mei3 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4]
according to a report/It is reported that...
Nikkei Shimbun, Japanese equivalent of Financial Times
pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2
